summary.span: Raises a pattern event or a custom event.

span.span: Raises a pattern event or a custom event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只要模式實作，應該不會引發模式事件。Pattern events should not be raised just by a pattern implementation. 例如，應該引發時叫用控制項時，透過或透過滑鼠或鍵盤輸入。For example, an should be raised whenever the control is invoked, either through or through mouse or keyboard input. 如此一來，用戶端可以收到相關通知的系統事件。In this way, clients can be informed about system events. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#122)] [!code-vb[UIAFragmentProvider_snip#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFragmentProvider_snip/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#122)]

summary.span: Raises an event when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree has changed.

span.span: Raises an event when the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更樹狀結構中的範例是要加入的子項目或從清單方塊中，移除或正在展開或摺疊樹狀結構檢視中。An example of a change in the tree structure is child elements being added to or removed from a list box, or being expanded or collapsed in a tree view. 其中一個元素，或其容器的執行階段識別項的子元素中移除時，會傳遞至建構函式。When a child element is removed, the runtime identifier of either the element, or of its container, is passed to the constructor. 在目前版本中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]，不過，沒有簡單的方法提供者的執行個體可以探索其執行階段識別項。In the current version of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], however, there is no easy way for an instance of a provider to discover its runtime identifier. 方法通常會傳回陣列，其中包含，識別常數，它會指示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]系統建立控制項的每個執行個體的唯一識別碼。The method normally returns an array that contains , a magic number that instructs the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] system to create a unique identifer for every instance of the control. 所提供的原始值不應在事件中，因為它是無意義的用戶端，且不能用來識別特定的執行個體。The raw value provided by should not be used in events, because it is meaningless to clients and cannot be used to identify a specific instance. 由於這項限制之類型的事件和不是非常有用。Because of this limitation, events of type and are not very useful. 或者，一律使用和，傳遞的執行階段識別項為 0。As an alternative, always use and , passing 0 as the runtime identifer. 您無法使用`null`，因為這會引發例外狀況。You cannot use `null`, as this will raise an exception. 用戶端將會收到通知已經在容器中進行變更 (由`sender`參數傳遞至)，且已加入或移除哪些子系的特定通知不。Clients will be notified that a change has been made in the container (identified by the `sender` parameter passed to the ), without specific notice of what children have been added or removed. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何引發的事件子系加入時，或從自訂清單方塊中移除。The following example shows how to raise an event when children are added to, or removed from, a custom list box. [!code-csharp[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#101)] [!code-vb[FragmentProvider#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentProvider/VisualBasic/ListFragment.vb#101)]
